coffees.name: Alberto Frias Chuquicahua
coffees.info: A new producer for us from the neighbouring farm of Saul Menor Tayca, the Alberto Frias Chuquicahua. A small farm in which Alberto does all the methodical harvesting and processing resulting in this tasty cup full of vibrant peach notes, gentle honeysuckle and a custardlike mouthfeel.

coffees.name: Gitega Hills
coffees.info: Blood orange and plum flavours, with a luscious wild honey sweetness, feature prominently in the cup. Our first coffee from Gitega Hills, and we look forward to working with them in the years to come!

coffees.name: Las Brisas
coffees.info: Las Brisas is a returning favourite from a group of producers in the Tolima region. Fresh plums up front followed by warm, smooth cinnamon, rounded off by a butterscotch sweetness. The perfect pick-me-up for any time of day!

coffees.name: Magwila
coffees.info: Magwila was way too delicious to only have as a filter, so we are offering it as an espresso too! Grown in the Mbozi region, Magwila espresso shows notes of blackcurrant and apple followed by wine gum sweetness.
